Abigail Plummer

I am a physics PhD student at Harvard University. This site describes some of my research in soft matter, population genetics, and fluid turbulence.


plummer [at] g.harvard.edu

Where to get help

If you think you’ve found a bug in The Minimal Theme, please check the existing issues, and if no one has reported the problem, open a new issue.

If you have a general question about the theme, how to implement it, or how to customize it for your site you have two options:

  1. Contact GitHub Support, or

  2. Ask your question of the Jekyll community on talk.jekyllrb.com
